connectionSteps: Click 'Scan to Connect Wallet' button to open QR code
Use your mobile wallet app to scan the QR code
Confirm the connection request on your mobile wallet
System will automatically switch to X Layer Testnet
walletList: OKX Wallet, MetaMask, Trust Wallet, TokenPocket

registration.title: Welcome to Web3 SSH Manager
